author: JamesWTruher
body:
## Steps to reproduce

create a file with contents

```
enum EE {
  E1
  E2
}
```

execute that file
## Expected behavior

no errors
## Actual behavior

```
PS /home/james/PowerShell/test/powershell/Language/Parser> ./foo.ps1
The given assembly name or codebase was invalid. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131047)
At line:1 char:1
+ ./foo.ps1
+ ~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : OperationStopped: (:) [], FileLoadException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.IO.FileLoadException

```
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      Linux
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v0.5.0-158-g7ce2b416dd16d8841c971e4e49acb071a466e402-dirty
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              1.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1


```

``` sh
$ dotnet --info
PS /home/james/PowerShell/test/powershell/Language/Parser> dotnet --info
.NET Command Line Tools (1.0.0-preview2-003119)

Product Information:
 Version:            1.0.0-preview2-003119
 Commit SHA-1 hash:  0708fe095e

Runtime Environment:
 OS Name:     ubuntu
 OS Version:  14.04
 OS Platform: Linux
 RID:         ubuntu.14.04-x64


$ git rev-parse HEAD; git status
PS /home/james/PowerShell/test/powershell/Language/Parser> git rev-parse HEAD; git status
5c53be93b3e9035ac11204a2c9ac951c0a71a8ec
On branch jimtru/testrestructure
Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by 8 commits.
  (use "git push" to publish your local commits)
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

        ../CompletionTestSupport.psm1
        ../LanguageTestSupport.psm1
        ./


```
title: creating enum on linux returns an error
